item.title: Editing HTML Files
item.description: Editing HTML files can be done with a default text editor, or an IDE of your choice. To Open using text editor: Windows Right click on the file you want edited Select “Open with” You will be presented with a list of applications. Select Notepad from the list. If you don’t see Notepad, click “More options” A window with the code will be displayed. You can edit the file, then save by pressing Ctrl+S.
